summary: The fairy tale of a young aspiring singer who leaves her hometown to a major city, in order to make her dreams come true.
cast: Selvagem Big Abreu|Juliana Baroni|Marilu Bueno|Berna Ceppas|Rubens Correia|Duda Esteves|Flavia Fernandes|Bob Gallo|Cláudio Heinrich|Leina Krespi|Júlia Lemmertz|Avelar Love|Sergio Mallandro|Cláudio Mamberti|Thelma Reston|Bianca Rinaldi|Letícia Spiller|Michael Sullivan|Xuxa
title: Lua de Cristal
